dcterms:description: The ConvAI2 dataset is of high quality and is used for model fine-tuning in open-ended text generation tasks. It consists of dialogue turns, and the persona information is discarded to make the task more open-ended.
dcterms:title: ConvAI2

dcterms:creator: Nouha Dziri
Ehsan Kamalloo
Kory Wallace Mathewson
Osmar R Zaiane
dcterms:description: The Reddit dataset consists of more than 10 million dialogue turns and is used for pre-training models. It is noted for being noisy and containing some offensive language.
dcterms:title: Reddit dataset
